attributes.action: Leave the EU on WTO rules 29th March 2019.
attributes.additional_details:
Hysteria, lies, skulduggery that can only be described as embarrassing to watch for a prolonged period of time, a Nation divided based on scaremongering.
Enough is enough, Information is readily available to demonstrate we will be able to leave with a WTO deal on the 29th March 2019 with limited issues to any services. And nearly £40bn saved to help prop it up if required. 
30 odd working days left, concentrate on a WTO exit and start working for the people.
attributes.background: After 2.5 years of disorganised and half hearted negotiations on behalf of the British public post referendum. The EU also making it very clear from the outset that the only deal on the table for GB would be a bad one at best to set an example for other members with the same appetite for freedom.
